response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present an exclusive opportunity for you to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value for us, and we believe it could be equally valuable to you. After careful consideration, I propose a special offer for this product at a price of $950,000. This offer is designed to provide you with a unique chance to own something truly remarkable while allowing us to achieve a mutually beneficial transaction.

Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions about the product. We are here to assist you every step of the way.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
